tasks.name: The 'Todo' bucket is your backlog of tasks.
You can reorder their priority with arrows or dragging.
The 'Doing' bucket is for tasks you're already working on.
Put tasks here when they're done.
Try dragging the tasks from 'Todo' into 'Doing'.
Buckets titled 'Done' will strike out tasks and hide them if older than 30 days. Try renaming this bucket to 'Done'.
All data is stored on your machine in the Browser. Only you can see it.
You can additionally encrypt the data with a password. You'll need to press 'Decrypt' and re-enter this password every time you revisit thereafter.
There are no external dependencies. No code libraries, frameworks, fonts or images.
In-fact (aside from fetching this webpage) no network requests are made.
If you forget the password while your data is visible, you can just re-encrypt it with a new password.
If you forget it while the data isn't loaded, you CANNOT GET IT BACK!
'ðŸ’£ Wipe' does exactly what it sounds like.
